Its not compatible with LT+2.0, if you've got a flashed drive then its probably not gonna work. I've burned numerous 360 games without trouble, and as soon as you select "Play NFS Underground 2" a message appears that states "its not supported on your Xbox 360 console, an update may be available at xbox.com/games...etc"
So if you're using a flashed console it probably wont work.
